about_the_game: Enhance your riding experience with the Monster Energy Supercross - Themed Liveries and Tracksuits, a set of custom liveries and tracksuits inspired by the themed races of Monster Energy Supercross. Pick your favorite camo texture and design among the 10 available and get ready to race.
detailed_description: Enhance your riding experience with the Monster Energy Supercross - Themed Liveries and Tracksuits, a set of custom liveries and tracksuits inspired by the themed races of Monster Energy Supercross. Pick your favorite camo texture and design among the 10 available and get ready to race.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K; AMD FX-6350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 with 2 GB VRAM or more; AMD Radeon HD 7800 with 2 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD FX-8350 Eight-Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 with 4 GB VRAM or more; AMD Radeon R9 380 with 4 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Enhance your riding experience with the Monster Energy Supercross - Themed Liveries and Tracksuits.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
